sen.j: 十石舟（じっこくぶね）は、月桂冠など55社の出資になる株式会社伏見夢工房が運航する遊覧船。
sen.e: Jikkoku-bune Boat is a pleasure boat operated by Fushimi Yumekobo Co., Ltd. funded by 55 companies including Gekkeikan Sake Co., Ltd.
Jikkoku-bune Boat is a pleasure boat operated by Fushimi Yumekobo Co., Ltd. funded by 55 companies including Gekkeikan Sake Co., Ltd.
Jikkoku-bune Boat is a pleasure boat operated by Fushimi Yumekobo Co., Ltd. funded by 55 companies including Gekkeikan Sake Co., Ltd.

sen.j: 京都府京都市伏見区の濠川（宇治川派流）の月桂冠大倉記念館裏の弁天橋から発着する。
sen.e: It arrives at and departs from Benten-bashi Bridge behind Gekkeikan Okura Sake Museum located beside Go-kawa River (a branch river of Uji-gawa River) in Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
It arrives at and departs from Benten-bashi Bridge behind Gekkeikan Okura Sake Museum located beside Go-kawa River (a branch river of Uji-gawa River) in Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
It arrives at and departs from Benten-bashi Bridge behind Gekkeikan Okura Sake Museum located beside Go-kawa River (a branch river of Uji-gawa River) in Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 歴史
江戸時代に伏見の酒、米、人を大坂に運ぶための、宇治川派流から淀川、淀川を航行する輸送船としてはじまった。
sen.e: It began as a transport boat sailing from Go-kawa River to Uji-gawa River or Yodo-gawa River for the purpose of transporting sake, rice and people from Fushimi to Osaka.
sen.cmt: ウィキペディアの「伏見十石舟」では、「淀川、淀川」ではなく「宇治川・淀川」となっていたので、そのように訳しました。一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: It began as a transport boat sailing from Go-kawa River to Uji-gawa River or Yodo-gawa River for the purpose of transporting sake, rice and people from Fushimi to Osaka.
It began as a transport boat sailing from Go-kawa River to Uji-gawa River or Yodo-gawa River for the purpose of transporting sake, rice and people from Fushimi to Osaka.

sen.j: これは明治時代末期まで存続した。
sen.e: These transport boats existed until the end of the Meiji Period.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: These transport boats existed until the end of the Meiji Period.
These transport boats existed until the end of the Meiji Period.

sen.j: 1998年にかつての港町伏見を偲ぶ屋形船仕様で遊覧船として再び濠川に航路が開設された。
sen.e: In 1998, the route from Go-kawa River once again opened for yakata-bune boat (house boat)-style pleasure boats in remembrance of one-time port town Fushimi.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: In 1998, the route from Go-kawa River once again opened for yakata-bune boat (house boat)-style pleasure boats in remembrance of one-time port town Fushimi.
In 1998, the route from Go-kawa River once again opened for yakata-bune boat (house boat)-style pleasure boats in remembrance of one-time port town Fushimi.

sen.j: そして現在に至っている。
sen.e: Since then, it has existed until now.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Since then, it has existed until now.
Since then, it has existed until now.

sen.j: データ
航路
- 弁天橋（月桂冠大倉記念館裏）→ 三栖閘門資料館（みすこうもんしりょうかん） → （折り返し）→ 弁天橋
sen.e: Benten-bashi Bridge (behind Gekkeikan Okura Sake Museum)=> Misu Komon Shiryokan (Misu Lock Gate Museum)=> (turn-round)=> Benten-bashi Bridge
Benten-bashi Bridge (behind Gekkeikan Okura Sake Museum)=> Misu Komon Shiryokan (Misu Lock Gate Museum)=> (turn-round)=> Benten-bashi Bridge
Benten-bashi Bridge (behind Gekkeikan Okura Sake Museum)=> Misu Komon Shiryokan (Misu Lock Gate Museum)=> (turn-round)=> Benten-bashi Bridge

sen.j: 定員
運航船舶
- 3隻（水古都、水都季、千姫）
運航時間
- 10時から16時20分まで約20分毎（11月下旬から12月上旬までは、10時から15時40分まで）
sen.e: Every 20 minutes from 10am to 4.20pm (from 10am to 3.40pm in late November through early December)
Every 20 minutes from 10am to 4.20pm (from 10am to 3.40pm in late November through early December)
Every 20 minutes from 10am to 4.20pm (from 10am to 3.40pm in late November through early December)

sen.j: 運休日
- 月曜日（祝日をのぞく）、8月下旬、12月下旬～3月
sen.e: Every Monday (exclusive of national holidays), late August, from late December to March
Every Monday (exclusive of national holidays), late August, from late December to March
Every Monday (exclusive of national holidays), late August, from late December to March

sen.j: 乗場
京都府京都市伏見区南浜町247
sen.e: 247, Minamihama-cho, Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture
247, Minamihama-cho, Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture
247, Minamihama-cho, Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture

sen.j: 近代化産業遺産
月桂冠大倉記念館をはじめとする月桂冠の施設群および松本酒造酒蔵とともに「伏見の日本酒醸造関連遺産」として近代化産業遺産の認定を受けている。
sen.e: Fushimi Jikkoku-bune Boat, facilities of Gekkeikan Sake Co., Ltd. including Gekkeikan Okura Sake Museum, and Breweries of Matsumoto Sake Brewing Co., Ltd. are designated officially as ''Heritage of Sake Brewing in Fushimi'', Heritage of Industrial Modernization.

Fushimi Jikkoku-bune Boat, facilities of Gekkeikan Sake Co., Ltd. including Gekkeikan Okura Sake Museum, and Breweries of Matsumoto Sake Brewing Co., Ltd. are designated officially as ''Heritage of Sake Brewing in Fushimi'', Heritage of Industrial Modernization.

Fushimi Jikkoku-bune Boat, facilities of Gekkeikan Sake Co., Ltd. including Gekkeikan Okura Sake Museum, and Breweries of Matsumoto Sake Brewing Co., Ltd. are designated officially as ''Heritage of Sake Brewing in Fushimi'', Heritage of Industrial Modernization.
